pullrequest.title: Add multi step widget to gui

content.raw:
Pressing the step button while the world is running causes a warning message to appear on the terminal "Calling World::StepWorld(steps) while world is not paused". Would it be better to grey out the step button until the user pauses? The tool-tip for the step button could indicate the need the pause the world first.

If I enter a large number, such as 9999, the gui locks up and there is no feedback that steps are running. Could we have the physics engine output a world_stats message for each step? This output should only be active when executing a series of steps.
